com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.jslib

Class SCUIJSLibraryRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.jslib.SCUIJSLibraryRegistry

  • public class SCUIJSLibraryRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds JS library definitions for an application. SCUIJSLibraryHelper keeps different instances of this class for each application. This class can be used to load JS library definition form a document or path for a xml document. asmishra SCUIJSLibraryMetaData#parseElement(Element) To get the info on individual attributes on target and include elements.

      • flushJSLLibraryDefinitions

        public void flushJSLLibraryDefinitions(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Used only in dev mode. This method can be used to flush all library metadata. definitions. All the libraries which were loaded with a xml file will be loaded again. uiContext

      • flushJSLLibraryDefinitions

        public void flushJSLLibraryDefinitions(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Used only in dev mode. This method can be used to flush all library metadata. definitions. All the libraries which were loaded with a xml file will be loaded again. servletContext

      • getRegisteredJSLibraries

        public java.util.HashMap getRegisteredJSLibraries()
        This method returns a map containing all JS library metadata registered for the application. hashMap containing metadata of registered JS libraries (of type SCUIJSLibraryMetaData) with their name as keys.

      • getjsLibrariesMap

        public java.util.HashMap getjsLibrariesMap()

      • loadJSLibrariesData

        public void loadJSLibrariesData(org.w3c.dom.Document inDoc)
        This method loads JS library definitions from a given document.
        Format of the document: 
        
        <project>
        <target name="scuiPlat" file="/platform/scripts/scuiplat.js" allowDynamicLoad="false" depends="" loadAfter="" followups="" requiredFor="">
        <include name="/platform/scripts/extdefaults.js" localizable="true"/>
        <!-- Multiple includes are allowed -->
        </target>
        <!-- Multiple includes are allowed -->
        </project>
        inDoc SCUIJSLibraryMetaData#parseElement(Element) To get the info on individual attributes on target and include elements.

      • loadJSLibraryXml

        public void loadJSLibraryXml(java.lang.String xmlPath,
                             SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method loads JS library definition from a given xml file path. Method can throw SCUIException if given file does not exist or is in non-xml format. xmlPath uiContext #loadJSLibraryXml(String, ServletContext) SCUIJSLibraryMetaData#parseElement(Element) To get the info on individual attributes on target and include elements.

      • loadJSLibraryXml

        This method loads JS library definition from a given xml file path. Method can throw SCUIException if given file does not exist or is in non-xml format. xmlPath servletContext #loadJSLibrariesData(Document) SCUIJSLibraryMetaData#parseElement(Element) To get the info on individual attributes on target and include elements.

      • loadJSLibrariesData

        public void loadJSLibrariesData(org.w3c.dom.Element libEl,
                                java.lang.String overrideExisting)
        This method calls registerJSLibrary. It is meant to be used only in wufdevmode. If application is not running in dev mode then this method gives an error. If overrideExisting is set to true, then the existing library is deleted form the map and passed lib added by calling the registerJSLibrary(Element) method. If overrideExisting is set as false it simply calls the registerJSLibrary(Element) method. libEl overrideExisting
